title: Flag Data Schema
description: Schema for flag-data.yaml - the source of truth for all flags in the application, processed by the fetch-flags.js script to generate the flags.ts file.

categoryName.description: The name of the category as it will be displayed in the flag selector dropdown

displayOrder.description: The order in which the category will be displayed in the flag selector dropdown

flags.description: List of flags in this category

flagName.description: The official name of the flag

displayName.description: The name of the flag as it will be displayed in the flag selector dropdown

svg_url.description: The URL of the SVG file of the flag on Wikimedia Commons

description.description: A short description of the flag based on the Wikipedia page

reason.description: The reason why the flag is included based on the Wikipedia page (or other reliable source)

references.description: List of reference links for the flag

text.description: The display text for the reference link

cutoutMode.description: Optional cutout configuration. If present, enables cutout mode in the adjust step.

offsetEnabled.description: Governs whether the offset slider is visible. Defaults to false if the cutoutMode property doesn't exist.

defaultOffset.description: The default value of the offset slider. -50 (left edge of border touches left edge of flag), 0 (centre, no offset), 50 (right edge of border touches right edge of flag)
